text: Kasai-Oriental is one of the 26 provinces of the Democratic Republic of the Congo. The capital is Mbuji-Mayi, which is on the Sankuru River. The region produces a large amount of diamonds in their diamond mines. ==Political divisions== The province has the following five territories: * Kabeya-Kamwanga * Katanda * Lupatapata * Miabi * Tshilenge ==References== Kasai-oriental Category:2015 establishments in Africa
